Translations.Text: tamane sum tha'i gayum che? Kevi vato kaheta pharo cho
sum tame samajata pana nathi
athava tamari pase a vatano ko'i spasta puravo che
to java, saca hova to potani ja kitaba la'i avo
Ane te loko'e allaha ane jinnata vacce sambandha theravyo, jo ke jinnato pote jane che ke te'o (avi astha rakhanara loko)yatana same raju karavamam avase
je kami a loko varnana kari rahya che tenathi allaha ta'ala pavitra che
allahana nikhalasa banda'o sivaya
kharekhara tame sau ane tamara pujyo
ko'i ekane pana pathabhrasta kari nathi sakata
je jahannamamam rahevavalo che tena sivaya
(pharista'oni vata evi che ke) amara manthi darekani jagya nakki che
ane ame (allahani bandagi mate) la'inabandha ubha che
ane tena namanum smarana kari rahya che
inkara karanara kaheta hata
ke jo amari same pahelana lokonum varnana karavamam avatum
to ame pana allahana nikatana banda bani jatam
parantu a kura'anano inkara karava lagya, basa! Have najikamam ja jani lese
ane amarum vacana pahelathi ja potana payagambaro mate nakki tha'i gayum che
ke kharekhara te lokoni ja madada karavamam avase
ane amarum ja laskara vijaya melavase
have tame thodanka divasa sudhi temanathi modhum pheravi lo
ane temane jota raho ane te loko pana agala jo'i lese
sum a loko amara prakopani utavala kari rahya che
sambhalo! Jyare amaro prakopa temana medanamam avi jase, te samaye temani savara khuba ja kharaba hase, je lokone saceta karavamam avya hata
tame thodoka samaya sudhi temano vicara karavanum chodi do
ane jota raho ke te loko pana hamana ja jo'i lese
pavitra che tamaro palanahara, je ghani ja ijajatavalo che, te dareka vastuthi (jenum musarika loko) varnana kare che
payagambaro para salama che
Ane dareka prakarani prasansa allaha mate ja che je samagra srstino palanahara che
